trends: There has been one other sighting in Ilderton
There were no other sightings in Ilderton on or around June 6th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsi litterally just opened my back door and let my dog out for a pee. looked up and immediatley saw this amazing bright star pretty much straight over head. Only thing was it was basically overhead and was really really bright and moving pretty fast. i hold a canadian commercial pilots licence and routinley watch the night sky. this was different in the way that i could not see any normal lights on a plane; no strobe no green or red or flashing red tail light. just one very bright silent with no exaust trail. i could not make a shape out as it was soo bright and quite high. i followed it with my eye untill it went on its path into the distance and disapeared out of sight behind the trees. I dont know what it was but it got my attention. i tried to take video with my iphone but realized the video was not showing the object.
